summary: The diff implements the core requirements for dual pricing, fare estimator, T&C checkbox, and UI refresh on the Car Rentals page. REQ-38, REQ-39, REQ-40, and REQ-41 are substantially covered. Backend migration and schema updates are present. Minor gaps exist around explicit no-box-shadow enforcement and full confirmation of footer T&C link.

missing_requirements.requirement: The T&C page must remain accessible from the footer (REQ-40 AC: 'The T&C page remains accessible from the footer')
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary for Footer.tsx only mentions TanStack Router Links for internal navigation generally, but does not explicitly confirm a Terms & Conditions link is present in the footer.

missing_requirements.requirement: REQ-41: Car Rentals page has no box shadows; depth is conveyed via borders and background contrasts
missing_requirements.reason: While index.css adds a shadow-free home-card class and removes shadows from the search widget, the CarRentalsPage.tsx diff is truncated and does not explicitly confirm that vehicle cards use no box shadows.
